name: Domino Dash
description:
Domino Dash is the result of the game jam ludum dare 43. The theme was "Sacrifices must be made" and this is my submission.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse - Place/Remove a Brick
  • Space - Play/Build Mode
  • Scroll Wheel/Arrow Keys - Turn Brick
  • Left Mouse + Drag - Navigate
  • Right Mouse + Drag - Rotate
  • Delete - Refresh Level
  • Escape - Back to Menu
